body:
Folks, as of 10:00am est today it seems most wall servers are having trouble. If your going to play walls use Walls05 it seems to be working correctly - so far.  This is not a server error report, or bug report, etc, this is just letting players know that if your playing walls use walls05 at the moment as it seems to be the most stable. I'm sure it will be fixed soon, but for now I hope this helps you play walls if your wanting to play.

Thanks

title: Just quick info until the fix [walls]

replies.body: Thanks for letting us know Polar! :D

replies.body: I have a midterm tomorrow but good to know in case I sneak a game or two in...:) thanks polar!

replies.body:
update:

The Rotations seem to have been fixed: - Awesome Job : 

( Monsterbash still using the bugged blue team map tho, so if you play monsterbash please note that if your blue you will not be able to mine until the walls drop. ( new map and yml has been submitted to the map devs.. ) 

have Fun.
